*p**location_mentioned*Austins Colony*/location_mentioned**/p* *p*This *date_mentioned n="11-10-1826">day */date_mentioned*personaly appeared before me *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* in and for *location_mentioned*the Colony aforesaid*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Isaac Foster*/person_mentioned* who being duly sworn deposeth and Saith that sometime during the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1826">last Fall*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*William Cooper*/person_mentioned* a citisen of *location_mentioned*this Colony*/location_mentioned* handed *person_mentioned*deponent*/person_mentioned* a piece of money as a Gold piece considered to be a half doubloon with a request that *person_mentioned*depont*/person_mentioned* would hand it to *person_mentioned*John Foster*/person_mentioned* that sd *person_mentioned*John Foster*/person_mentioned* might with it and other money delivered at same time purchase for *person_mentioned*Cooper*/person_mentioned* a *location_mentioned*steel Mill*/location_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*deponent*/person_mentioned* says he accordingly delivered said piece of money to said *person_mentioned*John Foster*/person_mentioned* with such instructions and says that sd piece of money was never out of depts possession from the time of so receiving it from *person_mentioned*Cooper*/person_mentioned* untill he delivered it to said *person_mentioned*Jno Foster*/person_mentioned* as afd—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*I. G. Foster*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Subscribed and Sworn to before me at *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="11-10-1826">10 Nov. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Judge [Rubric]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-10-1826">This day*/date_mentioned* personally appeared before me *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* in and for the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* afd*person_mentioned*Wm. Cooper*/person_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*Citizen */person_mentioned*of the same who being duly sworn deposeth and Saith that sometime during the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1826">last Fall*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Robert H Williams*/person_mentioned* a resident in *person_mentioned*this Colony*/person_mentioned* handed *person_mentioned*depont*/person_mentioned* a piece of money are [or] gold piece and considered to be Worth Eight Dollars in part payment of a debt due by said *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*deponent*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*deponent*/person_mentioned* says at the time of receiving sd piece of money from said *person_mentioned*Robert H Williams*/person_mentioned*, nor at any time since has he had in his possession any piece of Gold of the denomn or supposed value of sd piece so recd from *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* says that shortly afterward he delivered the said piece of money to *person_mentioned*Isaac Foster*/person_mentioned* in order to deliver the same to *person_mentioned*John Foster*/person_mentioned* for the purpose of purchasing a *location_mentioned*steel mill*/location_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*depont*/person_mentioned*—says that the piece of money so delivered to said *person_mentioned*Isaac Foster*/person_mentioned* is the same piece which he received from the said *person_mentioned*Robert H Williams*/person_mentioned* as afd*/p*
*p*his*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*William*/person_mentioned* x *person_mentioned*Cooper*/person_mentioned**/p*

*p*Subscribed by sd *person_mentioned*Declarant*/person_mentioned* by making his mark and sworn to by him in due form at *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="11-10-1826">10 Novr 1826*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
